archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.name: Interoperability Standards
archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation:
Interoperability Standards (<<Standard>>)
Description: Frameworks enabling systems to exchange and use information.
Examples:
• FHIR standards implementation • HL7 v2 and v3 messaging • DICOM for imaging exchange • NCPDP for pharmacy data • IHE integration profiles
